attributes.review: Don’t ban Tiktok then you will probably get more votes. TikTok is the only thing that can make me laugh and you want to take that away from me😭

attributes.review: i think you’ve learned by now that you don’t want to mess with gen z, so why are you banning our only source of joy. ik you don’t want china to spy on us but like really all we post are memes. so unless you want to make an entire generation more mad at you, you should probably not ban this app just saying.
attributes.title: don’t ban tiktok
